select IRA_APPLY_ID,USER_NUM,SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY,OVERTHROW_REASON,AVAG_PD as AVAG_PD,ORG_NUM,IS_OVERTHROW,to_char(OVERTHROW_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') as OVERTHROW_DT from TB_IRM_OVERTHROW_RECORD,TB_IRM_SCALE_DEF where 1=1 and AFTER_GRADE = SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY and AFTER_GRADE !='aaa' and ira_apply_id =#{iraApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR } union select IRA_APPLY_ID, USER_NUM,SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY,OVERTHROW_REASON,AVAG_PD as AVAG_PD,ORG_NUM,IS_OVERTHROW,to_char(OVERTHROW_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') as OVERTHROW_DT from TB_IRM_OVERTHROW_RECORD,TB_IRM_SCALE_DEF where 1=1 and AFTER_GRADE = SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY and AFTER_GRADE !='aaa' and ira_apply_id =#{oldApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR } union select distinct a.IRA_APPLY_ID, a.USER_NUM,b.SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY,a.OVERTHROW_REASON, c.AVAG_PD as AVAG_PD,a.ORG_NUM,a.IS_OVERTHROW,to_char(a.OVERTHROW_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') as OVERTHROW_DT from TB_IRM_OVERTHROW_RECORD a left join TB_IRM_SCALE_DEF b on a.AFTER_GRADE = b.SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY left join (select SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY , max(AVAG_PD) as AVAG_PD from TB_IRM_SCALE_DEF where SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY ='aaa' group by SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY) c on a.AFTER_GRADE = c.SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY where 1=1 and AFTER_GRADE ='aaa' and ira_apply_id = #{iraApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR } union select distinct a.IRA_APPLY_ID, a.USER_NUM,b.SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY,a.OVERTHROW_REASON, c.AVAG_PD as AVAG_PD,a.ORG_NUM,a.IS_OVERTHROW,to_char(a.OVERTHROW_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') as OVERTHROW_DT from TB_IRM_OVERTHROW_RECORD a left join TB_IRM_SCALE_DEF b on a.AFTER_GRADE = b.SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY left join (select SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY , max(AVAG_PD) as AVAG_PD from TB_IRM_SCALE_DEF where SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY ='aaa' group by SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY) c on a.AFTER_GRADE = c.SMALL_LTD_DISPLAY where 1=1 and AFTER_GRADE ='aaa' and ira_apply_id = #{oldApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR } order by OVERTHROW_DT desc ;
